metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11410 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Liblouis 3.5.0. A invalid free in the compileRule function in compileTranslationTable.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11410` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
liblouis14 - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
python-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> trusty and xenial hasn't the affected code. for artful and devel POC is not reproducible. Only bionic has core dump behaviour testing with the POC.

criterions.comment: liblouis package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.0-1ubuntu0.1').
